localResource.name: ArticleHierarchy
localResource.label: ArticleHierarchy
localResource.queryString: select a.* from ( Select distinct isnull(Lev1ArticleHierarchyId,0) as ID ,isnull(Lev1ArticleHierarchyName,0) as ArticleHierarchy from RBIM.Dim_Article WHERE ArticleIdx > 0 AND ISNULL(Lev1ArticleHierarchyName,0)<>'' union Select distinct isnull(Lev2ArticleHierarchyId,0) as ID, '. ' + ISNULL(Lev2ArticleHierarchyName,0) as ArticleHierarchy from RBIM.Dim_Article where ArticleIdx > 0 AND ISNULL(Lev2ArticleHierarchyName,0) <> '' union Select distinct isnull(Lev3ArticleHierarchyId,0) as ID, '.. ' + ISNULL(Lev3ArticleHierarchyName,0) as ArticleHierarchy from RBIM.Dim_Article WHERE ArticleIdx > 0 and ISNULL(Lev3ArticleHierarchyName,0) <> '' union Select distinct isnull(Lev4ArticleHierarchyId,0) as ID, '... ' + ISNULL(Lev4ArticleHierarchyName,0) as ArticleHierarchy from RBIM.Dim_Article where ArticleIdx > 0 and ISNULL(Lev4ArticleHierarchyName,0) <> '' union Select distinct isnull(Lev5ArticleHierarchyId,0) as ID, '.... ' + ISNULL(Lev5ArticleHierarchyName,0) as ArticleHierarchy from RBIM.Dim_Article where ArticleIdx > 0 AND ISNULL(Lev5ArticleHierarchyName,0) <> '' ) a order by CAST(ID AS INT)
